fields.value: Matching SIPO patents to firms in the Annual Survey of Industrial Enterprises (ASIE) of China's National Bureau of Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Matching SIPO patents to firms in the Annual Survey of Industrial Enterprises (ASIE) of China's National Bureau of Statistics. Please refer to the user documentation "Construction of a database linking SIPO patents to firms in China’s Annual Survey of Industrial Enterprises 1998-2009" for more details about this dataset.
Alternative data access: https://sites.google.com/site/sipopdb/home/sipo---asie

fields.value:
Suggested citation for the three data files below:
He, Z.-L., Tong, T.W., Zhang, Y., & He, W. 2016. Construction of a database linking SIPO patents to firms in China’s Annual Survey of Industrial Enterprises 1998-2009. Working Paper, Chinese Patent Data Project.

files.description: Data file is in tab delimited format. Please use the import function of Excel or Stata to load data into memory. 398,483 records (387,250 true matches, among which 291,578 are unique)
files.label: ASIE firms matched to design patents.txt
